description:
Ubuntu 10.10 / trunk downloaded 10 APR 2011

##########

2011-04-10 19:02:57,294 DEBUG migrate.versioning.util [-] Disposing SQLAlchemy engine Engine(sqlite:////root/openstack/nova/trunk/nova/..//tests.sqlite) from (pid=5374) with_engine /usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/migrate/versioning/util/__init__.py:163
2011-04-10 19:02:57,547 DEBUG nova.utils [-] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/root/openstack/nova/trunk/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=5374) __get_backend /root/openstack/nova/trunk/nova/utils.py:427
ERROR

======================================================================
ERROR: <nose.suite.ContextSuite context=nova.tests>
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nose/suite.py", line 183, in run
    self.setUp()
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nose/suite.py", line 264, in setUp
    self.setupContext(ancestor)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nose/suite.py", line 287, in setupContext
    try_run(context, names)
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nose/util.py", line 487, in try_run
    return func()
  File "/root/openstack/nova/trunk/nova/tests/__init__.py", line 65, in setup
    cleandb = os.path.join(FLAGS.state_path, FLAGS.sqlite_clean_db)
  File "/root/openstack/nova/trunk/nova/flags.py", line 139, in __getattr__
    val = gflags.FlagValues.__getattr__(self, name)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/gflags.py", line 810, in __getattr__
    raise AttributeError(name)
AttributeError: sqlite_clean_db
title: run_tests.py fails on trunk -- AttributeError: sqlite_clean_db

Ubuntu 10.10 / trunk downloaded 10 APR 2011

##########

2011-04-10 19:02:57,294 DEBUG migrate.versioning.util [-] Disposing SQLAlchemy engine Engine(sqlite:////root/openstack/nova/trunk/nova/..//tests.sqlite) from (pid=5374) with_engine /usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/migrate/versioning/util/__init__.py:163

comments.content: Can't reproduce that. My tests pass on Ubuntu 10.10 / latest trunk, ./run_tests.sh -N
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Image related problem, reuploaded the image, and everything is working as expected.
